mapper.select: select id, prod, stragety_point, stragety_point_name, variable_id, `repeat`, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, name, distinguish_product from vpp.vpp_variable_method_mapping where id = #{id}

select id, prod, stragety_point, stragety_point_name, variable_id, `repeat`, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, name, distinguish_product from vpp.vpp_variable_method_mapping where stragety_point = #{stragetyPoint}

select id, prod, stragety_point, stragety_point_name, variable_id, `repeat`, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, name, distinguish_product from vpp.vpp_variable_method_mapping limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into vpp.vpp_variable_method_mapping(prod, stragety_point, stragety_point_name, variable_id, repeat, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, name, distinguish_product) values (#{prod}, #{stragetyPoint}, #{stragetyPointName}, #{variableId}, #{repeat}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{name}, #{distinguishProduct})
mapper.update:
update vpp.vpp_variable_method_mapping
prod = #{prod},
stragety_point = #{stragetyPoint},
stragety_point_name = #{stragetyPointName},
variable_id = #{variableId},
repeat = #{repeat},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
name = #{name},
distinguish_product = #{distinguishProduct},
where id = #{id}
